mapper.select: select a.id,a.name,b.name categoryName, (case a.select_type when 0 then '唯一' when 1 then '单选' when 2 then '多选' end) select_type, (case a.input_type when 0 then '手工录入' when 1 then '从列表中选取' end) input_type, a.input_list,a.sort,a.filter_type, a.search_type,a.related_status,a.hand_add_status,a.type from pms_product_attribute a,pms_product_attribute_category b where product_attribute_category_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.product_attribute_category_id = b.id
mapper.sql: id, product_attribute_category_id, name, select_type, input_type, input_list, sort, filter_type, search_type, related_status, hand_add_status, type
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from pms_product_attribute
order by ${orderByClause}
